subject: Re: Newbie Intro and Questions
author: Allen
full_text:
If you think it might help you, use the candle.  It will not hurt
things.  I generally just announce I am beginning a recording session
and then say I am ending it prior to shutting down.  I believe spirit
understands your intentions so no ceremony is needed.  It is more a
matter of having spirits around at the moment that have the
energy/inclination to communicate.  The only drawback to using the
candle is becoming accustomed to it and then going somewhere where you
can't use it when you collect EVP's. 

Allen
